tooltip.energizedpower.energized_power_b: Left click a block to open the block's book page.
book.energizedpower.front.cover.text: 这个是这个模组的指南书！
tooltip.energizedpower.cable_insulator.t: This item can be crafted by clicking on a wool block with shears.
tooltip.energizedpower.teleporter_matrix: Teleporter Matrix settings were successfully cleared.
Teleporter Matrix settings were successfully set.
Teleporter Matrix settings were set but do not point to a Teleporter position.
Link by shift + right-clicking a Teleporter.
Unlink by right-clicking in the air.
tooltip.energizedpower.inventory_coal_en: 状态的切换是在空中右击。
If active items will be taken from the inventory but not from the hotbar.
tooltip.energizedpower.inventory_charger: Open the inventory of this item by using this item on air
tooltip.energizedpower.inventory_telepor: Open the inventory by shift + right-clicking in the air.
Teleport by right-clicking in the air.
tooltip.energizedpower.energy_analyzer.t: 点击一个能量方块来查看该方块的信息。
txt.energizedpower.energy_analyzer.no_en: 能量分析仪没有足够的能量（需要 %s）。
这个区块面是没有（FE）能量区块面的。
tooltip.energizedpower.fluid_analyzer.tx: Click on a block which contains fluids to retrieve information.
txt.energizedpower.fluid_analyzer.no_ene: The Fluid Analyzer has not enough power (%s are required).
txt.energizedpower.fluid_analyzer.no_flu: This block face contains no fluids.
txt.energizedpower.fluid_analyzer.fluid_: Tank count of the clicked face: %d
tooltip.energizedpower.wrench.txt.shift: The Wrench can be used to configure blocks.
tooltip.energizedpower.wrench.not_config: This block can not be configured.
tooltip.energizedpower.wrench_configurab: This block can be configured with a Wrench.
tooltip.energizedpower.fluid_pipe.wrench: Connection type of face (%s) was set to %s.
Connection type of face (%s) could not be changed.
该方块使用每一种物品的 %s/t。
输出模式 1：只会输出和剩下的物品。
输出模式 2：所有物品都需要有输入项目
tooltip.energizedpower.chargers.txt.shif: Chargers can be used to craft Energized Copper Ingots.
But you should use the Energizer instead,
tooltip.energizedpower.charger.item_ener: 这个物品需要 %s 才能充满。
These items need %s to be fully charged.
tooltip.energizedpower.cable.txt.shift.2: Cutters can be used to break cables faster.
tooltip.energizedpower.transformer.txt.s: 本方块可以链接不同类型的电缆。
输入面是深色的，有一个较大的菱形。
输出面是较浅的，有一个较小的正方形。
tooltip.energizedpower.solar_panel.txt.s: 该方块的效率取决于当前的时间。
tooltip.energizedpower.coal_engine.txt: 这个物品将产生 %s，直到被烧毁。
tooltip.energizedpower.thermal_generator: This fluid will produce %s until completely used up
This machine consumes Water and produces Dirty Water.
tooltip.energizedpower.advanced_pulveriz: This machine consumes Water and produces Dirty Water.
tooltip.energizedpower.metal_press.txt.s: Press Molds can be created in the Press Mold Maker.
tooltip.energizedpower.block_placer.bloc: 该方块需要 %s 来放置方块。
tooltip.energizedpower.fluid_tanks.fluid: Set the filter by left-clicking with an item which contains fluids.
Unset the filter by left-clicking without an item.
tooltip.energizedpower.fluid_pump.proces: This process still needs %s to be finished.
tooltip.energizedpower.drain.txt.shift: The Drain drains fluid source blocks above the block.
tooltip.energizedpower.lightning_generat: 该区块每次遭到电击时，都会产生 %s的能量。
必须将避雷针防置在该方块时才会生效。
无线充电站可以为玩家物品栏内的物品充能。
tooltip.energizedpower.teleporter.txt.sh: Press [%s] while above the Teleporter to teleport.
Teleporteration of players can also be triggered with redstone.
tooltip.energizedpower.teleporter.use.te: Teleporter Matrix contains an invalid position!
Teleporter Matrix contains an invalid dimension!
Teleporation to the Teleporter itself is not possible!
No Teleporter found at Teleporter Matrix coordinates!
tooltip.energizedpower.teleporter.use.bl: Teleportation for the dimension "%s" is disabled!
Teleportation within the dimension "%s" is disabled!
Teleportation from the dimension "%s" is disabled!
Teleportation to the dimension "%s" is disabled!
Teleportation for a dimension of dimension type "%s" is disabled!
Teleportation within a dimension of dimension type "%s" is disabled!
Teleportation from a dimension of dimension type "%s" is disabled!
Teleportation to a dimension of dimension type "%s" is disabled!
tooltip.energizedpower.recipe.energy_req: 这个配方需要 %s 才能合成。
recipes.energizedpower.transfer.too_larg: 这配方对于这个容器太大了！

painting.energizedpower.gear.author: JDDev0

painting.energizedpower.factory.author: JDDev0
advancements.energizedpower.advanced_mac: 更高级的机器需要这个制作基础。
advancements.energizedpower.reinforced_a: The most advanced machines need this base crafting item.
advancements.energizedpower.advanced_sol: 高级太阳能电池板需要...
advancements.energizedpower.reinforced_a: Required for the best solar panels...
Craft a Reinforced Advanced Upgrade Module.

Craft a Speed Upgrade Module (Tier II).
Craft a Speed Upgrade Module (Tier III).
Craft a Speed Upgrade Module (Tier IV).
Craft a Speed Upgrade Module (Tier V).

Craft a Energy Efficiency Upgrade Module (Tier II).
Craft a Energy Efficiency Upgrade Module (Tier III).
Craft a Energy Efficiency Upgrade Module (Tier IV).
Craft a Energy Efficiency Upgrade Module (Tier V).
advancements.energizedpower.energy_capac: Craft a Energy Capacity Upgrade Module (Tier I).
Craft a Energy Capacity Upgrade Module (Tier II).
Craft a Energy Capacity Upgrade Module (Tier III).
Craft a Energy Capacity Upgrade Module (Tier IV).
Craft a Energy Capacity Upgrade Module (Tier V).

Craft a Duration Upgrade Module (Tier II).
Craft a Duration Upgrade Module (Tier III).
Craft a Duration Upgrade Module (Tier IV).
Craft a Duration Upgrade Module (Tier V).
Craft a Duration Upgrade Module (Tier VI).

Craft a Range Upgrade Module (Tier II).
Craft a Range Upgrade Module (Tier III).

Craft an Extraction Depth Upgrade Module (Tier II).
Craft an Extraction Depth Upgrade Module (Tier III).
Craft an Extraction Depth Upgrade Module (Tier IV).
Craft an Extraction Depth Upgrade Module (Tier V).
advancements.energizedpower.moon_light_u: Craft a Moon Light Upgrade Module (Tier I).
Craft a Moon Light Upgrade Module (Tier II).
Craft a Moon Light Upgrade Module (Tier III).
advancements.energizedpower.press_mold_m: Use this block to make press molds for the Metal Press.
advancements.energizedpower.raw_press_mo: Use Clay Balls to make a Raw Press Mold. (Don't forget to cook it...)
Cooked Press Molds can be used in the Metal Press.
advancements.energizedpower.auto_crafter: 如果这个方块可以自动制作，谁还愿意手动制作？
advancements.energizedpower.advanced_aut: Craft multiple recipes with the same block.
advancements.energizedpower.crusher.desc: 石头，砂岩，圆石，沙砾，或其他方块。
advancements.energizedpower.auto_press_m: Craft an Auto Press Mold Maker.
advancements.energizedpower.assembling_m: Craft electronic components in the Assembling Machine.
advancements.energizedpower.plant_growth: 用植物培养室提高植物生长速度和收获量。
advancements.energizedpower.stone_solidi: Create stone blocks from Water and Lava.
advancements.energizedpower.block_placer: 方块被自动放置在世界中。
advancements.energizedpower.drain.title: The Drain
advancements.energizedpower.basic_machin: 这是制作每个机器的基本物品。
advancements.energizedpower.basic_solar_: 你的第一块太阳能电池板需要的两块太阳能单元。
advancements.energizedpower.battery_2.de: 这个电池可以储存与4个等级为一的电池能量。
advancements.energizedpower.battery_3.de: 第 III 级：是 II 级的两倍。
advancements.energizedpower.battery_4.de: 这是第 IV 级 - 就还有四级。
advancements.energizedpower.battery_5.de: V 级：你要给下一个电池充能...
advancements.energizedpower.battery_6.de: VI 级：你已经给你的电池充能了，这样可以获得更多的存储能量。
advancements.energizedpower.battery_7.de: VII 级：25万FE的存储容量! 我们能做得更好？
advancements.energizedpower.battery_8.de: 这是本模组最好的电池（它可以存储超过100万FE）。
advancements.energizedpower.battery_8_fu: 你居然将你的100万FE电池充满了电！
advancements.energizedpower.cable_insula: Cover your cables with this ingredient. (Can be crafted by clicking on wool with shears [Dispenser can be used too])
advancements.energizedpower.charger.desc: 用这个方块为你的物品充能。
advancements.energizedpower.inventory_ch: Charge energy items in your inventory with batteries.
advancements.energizedpower.charging_sta: 物品充能使用无线方式。
advancements.energizedpower.crystal_grow: Grow crystals in the Crystal Growth Chamber.
advancements.energizedpower.energized_cr: Used as a stabilizer in some advanced machines.
advancements.energizedpower.teleporter_m: The first step to achieve teleportation.
advancements.energizedpower.weather_cont: 使用气象调控中心调控天气。
advancements.energizedpower.time_control: 使用时间控制器更改时间。
通过烧东西来生产能量虽然不是最有好的，但目前来说已经最好的。
advancements.energizedpower.thermal_gene: Consume hot liquids to generate energy.
advancements.energizedpower.advanced_pow: Smelt multiple items at once with power.
advancements.energizedpower.item_conveyo: Transport items with item conveyor belts.
Load Items on an item conveyor belt.
Sort Items with the Item Conveyor Belt Sorter.
Distribute items evenly to multiple outputs.
Merge items evenly from multiple inputs.
advancements.energizedpower.iron_fluid_p: Transport fluids with iron fluid pipes.
advancements.energizedpower.golden_fluid: Transport fluids faster with golden fluid pipes.
advancements.energizedpower.fluid_tank_s: Store fluids in a small Fluid Tank.
advancements.energizedpower.fluid_tank_m: Store fluids in a medium Fluid Tank.
advancements.energizedpower.fluid_tank_l: Store fluids in a large Fluid Tank.
advancements.energizedpower.tin_cable.de: Transport low amounts of energy with a Tin Cable.
advancements.energizedpower.gold_cable.d: 用更好的电缆提供更多的能量。
advancements.energizedpower.energized_co: 具有非常高的能量吞吐量的电缆!
advancements.energizedpower.energized_cr: When do I even need to transport that much energy?
advancements.energizedpower.lv_transform: Can connect different tiers of cables.
advancements.energizedpower.ehv_transfor: Can transfer more than 2 million FE per tick.
advancements.energizedpower.advanced_bat: Store even more energy than the best battery item.
advancements.energizedpower.energizedpow: 充能铜锭是更好的铜锭。
advancements.energizedpower.energized_go: 能量化的金锭非常有光泽。
advancements.energizedpower.energized_po: 这是关于这个模组的指南手册。
advancements.energizedpower.hammer.title: 好工具
advancements.energizedpower.cutter.title: Cut, cut, cut
advancements.energizedpower.cutter.descr: Cutters can be used to craft wires.
advancements.energizedpower.wrench.title: Wrench configuration
advancements.energizedpower.advanced_bat: Transport even more energy on rails.
advancements.energizedpower.energizedpow: This is the start of your energized power journey.
advancements.energizedpower.energizer.de: 这台机器比充电器更快，高效地将你的铜锭能量化。
advancements.energizedpower.lightning_ge: 可以从闪电中获取能量。
advancements.energizedpower.energy_analy: 分析每一个方块 - 即使它们没有 GUI 界面!
advancements.energizedpower.inventory_co: Produce and distribute energy in your inventory.
advancements.energizedpower.silicon.desc: Now you can power-up your factory!
advancements.energizedpower.solar_panel_: II 级的比 I 级更好。
III 级--基本太阳能电池板中最好的。
Tier V - Only one tier left!
Tier VI - You have got the best solar panel!
advancements.energizedpower.uncharger.de: 将物品中的能量释放出来
book.energizedpower.page.welcome.title: 欢迎来到 Energized Power!
book.energizedpower.page.welcome.1: 这个 MOD 增加了许多与能源相关的物品和机器。
book.energizedpower.page.welcome.3: 你发现了一个 Bug 或想提建议？去这里 (英语)
book.energizedpower.page.credits.title: 鸣谢
book.energizedpower.page.credits.subtitl: 感谢你为 Energized Power 做的贡献!
book.energizedpower.page.cable_insulator: 电缆绝缘体是在制作电缆是所需要的。
It can be crafted by clicking on a wool block with shears.
也可以使用发射器制作。
book.energizedpower.page.saw_blade: 锯片是制作锯木机的材料。
book.energizedpower.page.silicon.1: 硅几乎是这个模组的所有物品和机器的材料。
book.energizedpower.page.silicon.2: 可以通过熔炼或高温烧炼下界石英来制作。
book.energizedpower.page.sawdust.1: 锯末是锯木机产出的副产品，锯末可以来制作锯末块。
book.energizedpower.page.sawdust.2: 锯末块可以烧制成木炭。
book.energizedpower.page.fertilizers: 肥料主要用来加快植物在培养室的速度。
book.energizedpower.page.ore_dusts: Ore dusts can be smelted to ingots.
book.energizedpower.page.charcoal_dust: Charcoal Dust can be used to craft Charcoal Filters.
book.energizedpower.page.charcoal_filter: Charcoal Filters are used to filter Dirty Water in the Filtration Plant.
book.energizedpower.page.plates.1: 板材是大部分机器制作所使用的材料。板材可以通过锤子或压缩机来制作。
book.energizedpower.page.plates.2: 只有压缩机可以制作充能板材。
Metal products (gears, rods, and wires) are used in many recipes.
Metal products can be created in the Metal Press.
book.energizedpower.page.circuits: Circuits are used in some recipes.
book.energizedpower.page.energized_coppe: 充能铜锭是充能站这样高级的机器需要的。
充能站是用这个锭做的，那倒不是吗？
充电站可以用来制作这种锭的。
book.energizedpower.page.energized_gold_: 充能金锭用于一些高级的机器(如充能站)。
book.energizedpower.page.energized_cryst: The Energized Crystal Matrix is used as a stabilizer in some advanced machines.
book.energizedpower.page.speed_upgrades: Speed upgrades make machines faster and increase the energy consumption.
book.energizedpower.page.energy_efficien: Energy Efficiency Upgrades reduce the energy consumption.
book.energizedpower.page.energy_capacity: Energy Capacity Upgrades increase the energy storage capacity and the energy transfer rate.
book.energizedpower.page.duration_upgrad: Duration Upgrades increase the duration of the weather set by the Weather Controller.
The Duration Upgrade (Tier VI) will allow the Weather Controller to maintain the current Weather but requires constant supply of energy.
book.energizedpower.page.range_upgrades: Range Upgrades increase the range a machine can operate in.
book.energizedpower.page.extraction_dept: Extraction Depth Upgrades increase the depth a machine can operate in.
book.energizedpower.page.furnace_mode_up: Furnace Mode Upgrades change the recipes a Powered Furnace can produce.
book.energizedpower.page.moon_light_upgr: Moon Light Upgrades allow Solar Panels to produce energy during the night.
book.energizedpower.page.hammers: 锤子是用来制造板材的工具。
book.energizedpower.page.cutters.1: Cutters can be used to craft wires.
book.energizedpower.page.cutters.2: Cutters can be used to break cables faster.
book.energizedpower.page.wrench: The Wrench can be used to configure blocks.
book.energizedpower.page.chapter.workben: Machines which must be operated manually.
book.energizedpower.page.press_mold_make: The Press Mold Maker can be used to create Press Molds for the Metal Press.
book.energizedpower.page.chapter.energy_: 能够产生、消耗或储存能量的物品。
book.energizedpower.page.inventory_coal_: 这个物品可以在你的物品栏中生产和分配能量。
状态的切换是在空中右击。
然后，燃料将自动从物品栏中获取。
book.energizedpower.page.inventory_charg: This item distributes energy in your inventory.
book.energizedpower.page.inventory_telep: The Inventory Teleporter can teleport players. It requires energy and a linked Teleporter Matrix to do so.
book.energizedpower.page.energy_analyzer: 能量分析仪可以获取静力分析能量。主要是为没用 GUI 的机器。
用这个点击方块来使用。
The Fluid Analyzer can be used to get fluid statics.
It can be used by clicking on blocks which contain fluids.
book.energizedpower.page.batteries.2: 电池可以通过无线充电站或充能站来充电，也可以使用放能站将其中的能量释放到网络中。
book.energizedpower.page.chapter.energy_: 可以生产能源、由能源驱动或运输能源的方块。
机器框架是每个机器的基本方块。
There are four machine frames: Basic, Hardened, Advanced, and Reinforced Advanced
book.energizedpower.page.cables.1: 电缆是将从生能源的方块向由能源驱动输送能源的方块。
book.energizedpower.page.cables.3: 如果有不同类型的电缆，需要变压器来连接这些电缆。
book.energizedpower.page.transformers.1: 变压器用于连接不同类型的电缆。
book.energizedpower.page.transformers.2: 输入面是深色的，有一个较大的菱形。
book.energizedpower.page.transformers.3: 输出面是较浅的，有一个较小的正方形。
book.energizedpower.page.transformers.4: There are four tiers of transformers: LV, MV, HV, and EHV.
book.energizedpower.page.transformers.5: For each tier there are three types of transformers: 1 to n, 3 to 3, and n to 1.
book.energizedpower.page.transformers.6: 使用变压器可以减轻电缆网络的延迟；要适当的使用变压器来代替电缆。
book.energizedpower.page.transformers.7: 变压器可以连接充能的电缆和其它类型的电缆。
book.energizedpower.page.transformers.8: 变压器可以当作一个电池组。
book.energizedpower.page.transformers.9: 变压器可以连接 AE2 中的电缆来获取能量。
book.energizedpower.page.minecart_charge: The Minecart Charger can charge the Minecart with Battery Box and the Uncharger can uncharge it.
A Redstone Comparator can be used to get the current power level of a Minecart which is being charged or uncharged.
The Advanced versions have a higher transfer rate.
book.energizedpower.page.battery_box: Battery boxes can store energy. All block faces support insertion and extraction of energy.
book.energizedpower.page.solar_cells.1: 太阳能单元是制作太阳能电池板的基本物品。
book.energizedpower.page.solar_cells.2: There are three solar cells: Basic, Advanced, and Reinforced Advanced
book.energizedpower.page.solar_panels.1: 太阳能电池板在白天产生能量。太阳能电池板的效率取决于那天的时间和天气情况。
book.energizedpower.page.solar_panels.2: 一共有6种太阳能电池板。
book.energizedpower.page.coal_engine.1: 煤炭发动机通过燃烧物品产生能量。
book.energizedpower.page.coal_engine.2: 剩余的物品将自动拿出。
The Heat Generator produces energy if flowing or still lava touches the block.
If the Heat Generator touches still lava, it will produce more energy than if it would touch flowing lava.
The more lava blocks are touching, the more energy per tick will be produced.
If you are playing a modpack, other hot fluids might be supported too.
book.energizedpower.page.thermal_generat: The Thermal Generator produces energy by consuming hot fluids.
If you are playing a modpack, other hot fluids might be supported too.
book.energizedpower.page.lightning_gener: 人造闪电发生器在每次雷击时产生大量的能量。
必须将避雷针防置在该方块时才会生效。
book.energizedpower.page.powered_lamp: The Powered Lamp is like a Redstone Lamp but requires energy instead of an active redstone signal.
book.energizedpower.page.powered_furnace: Powered Furnaces works like the Furnace. Instead of coal they use power and they are faster than the normal furnace.
The advanced version of the Powered Furnace has 3 input/output slot pairs.
book.energizedpower.page.auto_crafters.1: 自动合成机会自动合成物品。
book.energizedpower.page.auto_crafters.2: 可以通过使用自动合成机中的合成槽来放置配方。
book.energizedpower.page.auto_crafters.3: The Auto Crafter can handle recipe conflicts, that is recipes with the same inputs. To do this, use the "Cycle through recipes" button or set the pattern via a recipe viewer mod (like REI).
book.energizedpower.page.auto_crafters.4: The advanced version of the Auto Crafter supports multiple recipes at once.
book.energizedpower.page.crushers.1: 粉碎机可以粉碎石头、砂岩、圆石和沙砾等方块。
book.energizedpower.page.crushers.2: The advanced version of the Crusher consumes Water and produces Dirty Water.
book.energizedpower.page.pulverizers.1: The Pulverizer produces ore dusts which can be smelted to ingots.
book.energizedpower.page.pulverizers.2: The advanced version of the Pulverizer consumes Water and produces Dirty Water.
book.energizedpower.page.sawmill.1: 锯木机可以据原木和一些物品。
book.energizedpower.page.sawmill.2: 锯末是锯木机生产出的副产品，可以合成锯末块用于燃料。
book.energizedpower.page.compressor: 压缩机可以将一些金属锭压成板材。
book.energizedpower.page.metal_press.1: The Metal Press creates metal products (e.g. wires) from metals.
book.energizedpower.page.metal_press.2: Press Molds can be created in the Press Mold Maker.
book.energizedpower.page.metal_press.3: Press Molds can be inserted to and extracted from the top.
book.energizedpower.page.metal_press.4: Inputs can be inserted to and outputs can be extracted from all other sides.
book.energizedpower.page.auto_press_mold: The Auto Press Mold Maker is an automated version of the Press Mold Maker but requires a Shovel to craft recipes.
book.energizedpower.page.auto_stonecutte: The Auto Stonecutter is an automated version of the Stonecutter but requires a Pickaxe to craft recipes.
book.energizedpower.page.assembling_mach: The Assembling Machine creates electronic components (e.g. circuits).
Outputs can be extracted from all sides.
Inputs can be inserted from all sides (Top/Bottom: All inputs slots, Front: Bottom slot, Back: Top slot, Left: Left slot, Right: Right slot).
book.energizedpower.page.plant_growth_ch: The Plant Growth Chamber can boost plant growth and yield.
The right input slot is the seed slot.
The left, optionally usable input slot is the fertilizer slot.
When it is used, energy and speed multipliers are applied.
Seeds can be inserted from the north, east, south, and west. Fertilizers can be inserted from the top and bottom. Outputs can be extracted from all block faces.
If you'd like to use a fertilizer, the fertilizer must be inserted first.
If you'd like to automate this blocks, you need to keep in mind that yields are randomized.
book.energizedpower.page.stone_solidifie: The Stone Solidifier produces Stone blocks from Water and Lava.
Fluids must be inserted with a pipe.
book.energizedpower.page.filtration_plan: The Filtration Plant can filter raw ores from Dirty Water.
Charcoal Filters can be inserted from every block face. Outputs can be extracted from block face.
book.energizedpower.page.fluid_transpose: The Fluid Transposer can extract fluids from items (Mode: Emptying) and can inject fluids into items (Mode: Filling).
book.energizedpower.page.block_placer.1: 方块放置器可以放置所有的方块（甚至可以是门和种子）。
book.energizedpower.page.block_placer.2: 只有在可以放置方块的情况下才会放置方块。
book.energizedpower.page.fluid_filler_fl: The Fluid Filler can fill fluids into items and the Fluid Drainer can drain fluids from items.
book.energizedpower.page.fluid_pump: The Fluid Pump can pump fluids from the world and requires Cobblestone to do so.
book.energizedpower.page.charger_uncharg: 充能站可以为物品充能，放能站可以将物品中的能量释放到网络中。
The advanced version of the Charger and the Uncharger have 3 slots.
book.energizedpower.page.charging_statio: 无线充能站可以在一定的范围内为玩家物品栏中的物品充能。
book.energizedpower.page.crystal_growth_: The Crystal Growth Chamber can be used to grow crystals like amethysts.
book.energizedpower.page.energizer: Energizer 可以很好地给物品充能。
book.energizedpower.page.weather_control: 气象调控中心可以暂时更改天气，但是需要电力维持。
book.energizedpower.page.time_controller: 时间控制器可以更改一天中的时间，但是需要电力维持。
更改不可撤销，时间会继续向前。
book.energizedpower.page.teleporter_matr: Teleporter Matrices are used for linking Teleporters.
The settings of a Teleporter Matrix can be copied by putting a linkend and one or more unlinked Teleporter Matricies into a Crafting Table.
book.energizedpower.page.teleporter.1: The Teleporter can teleport players. It requires energy and a linked Teleporter Matrix to do so.
book.energizedpower.page.teleporter.2: It outputs a redstone signal if the Teleporter is ready for teleportation.
book.energizedpower.page.teleporter.3.1: The Teleporter can be triggered manually by pressing
book.energizedpower.page.chapter.fluid_b: Blocks that can store and transfer fluids.
book.energizedpower.page.fluid_pipes.2: The mode of every pipe side can be configured with a Wrench.
book.energizedpower.page.fluid_pipes.3: A single fluid pipe block can only extract one fluid type at once even when multiple sides are configured as extraction.
book.energizedpower.page.fluid_pipes.4: There are two tiers of fluid pipes: Iron and Golden.
book.energizedpower.page.fluid_tanks.2: There are three tiers of fluid tanks: Small, Medium, and Large.
book.energizedpower.page.drain.1: The Drain drains fluid source blocks above the block.
book.energizedpower.page.drain.2: On the Fabric version the Drain can extract fluids from Cauldrons.
book.energizedpower.page.item_conveyor_b: Item Conveyor belts can transport items.
The slope of conveyor belts can be configured with a Wrench.
Conveyor belts can be loaded with hoppers and any block which can insert items into blocks.
Conveyor belts can insert items into blocks in front of the conveyor belt.
Alternatively they can be unloaded with hoppers and other blocks which can extract items from blocks.
Conveyor belts are compatible with the AE2 item tunnel.
The Item Conveyor Belt Loader can extract items from any storage blocks (even other conveyor belts) and load them onto a conveyor belt.
The larger square must face the block where items are extracted from and the smaller square must face a conveyor belt.
Alternatively items can be extracted from the loader with hoppers and other blocks which can extract items from blocks.
It can be stacked vertically and horizontally.
It can be disabled with a redstone signal.
The Item Conveyor Belt Sorter takes items from an input conveyor belt and routes them to certain output conveyor belt.
The input conveyor belt must face the large square and must not be ascending.
There are no restrictions for the output conveyor belts.

The outputs are color coded (red: first output and always on the left side relative to the input, yellow: second output and on the opposite side relative to the input, green: third output and on the right side relative to the input).
The item will be routed to the first output where the filter matched (Priority: OUT 1, OUT 2, OUT 3).
The filter matches if at least one pattern item of the output filter row matches the input item.
Pattern items can be placed by taking the item from the inventory and left-clicking a pattern slot. The filter can be reset by left-clicking without an item.
To allow any items select blacklist without any pattern items. If an output is not connected the filter should be set to whitelist without any pattern items.
A redstone signal of strength 15 will be emitted if no filter matches (If no output is connected or if it is full no redstone signal will be emitted).

The Item Conveyor Belt Switch takes items from the input conveyor belt (Must face the large square and must not be ascending) and puts them onto the output conveyor belt on the side with the green indicator.
As long as a redstone signal is applied, the other output will be selected.
The Item Conveyor Belt Splitter takes items from the input conveyor belt (Must face the large square and must not be ascending) and puts them evenly on the connected output conveyor belts.
The Item Conveyor Belt Merger takes items evenly from the connected input conveyor belts (They must face a large square and must not be ascending) and puts them on the output conveyor belt.
book.energizedpower.page.dirty_water.1: Dirty Water is produced as a by-product in some machines which consume Water.
book.energizedpower.page.dirty_water.2: Dirty Water can be cleaned in the Filtration Plant.
book.energizedpower.page.upgrade_configu: Most machines support Upgrade Modules. Upgrades can not be inserted automatically.
book.energizedpower.page.redstone_mode_c: Ignore: The machine is always active
High: The machine is only active if a redstone signal of strength 1 or higher is present
Low: The machine is only active if no redstone signal is present
book.energizedpower.page.comparator_mode: Item: The comparator output is calculated based on how full the inventory of the machine is
Fluid: The comparator output is calculated based on how full the tank(s) of the machine is/are
Energy: The comparator output is calculated based on how much energy is stored in the machine
book.energizedpower.page.battery_box_min: Battery Box Minecarts can transport energy on rails. It can be charged with Minecart Chargers and can be uncharged with Minecart Unchargers.
book.energizedpower.page.chapter.structu: 在你的世界中产生的结构。
book.energizedpower.page.electrician.1: 电工村民可以在电工房中找到。
book.energizedpower.page.electrician.2: 电工房在每个原版村庄中都能找到。
book.energizedpower.page.electrician.3: 使用基本机器框架可以召唤一个电工村民。
book.energizedpower.page.factory.title: 厂房
book.energizedpower.page.factory.1: 厂房中会有些机器，在中心位置还有一些有趣的东西。厂房可以在森林和繁花森林群系中找到。
book.energizedpower.page.small_solar_far: 小型太阳能发电场带有一些太阳能，可以产生电力。小型太阳能发电场可以在沙漠、恶地和热带草原热带草原生物群系中找到。
